about.title: About Me
about.content: Hi! I’m Eren, a developer who enjoys writing code in the .NET ecosystem and building modern web projects. I prioritize clean code, sustainability, and clear architectural principles. I value teamwork and care about structure and standards as much as communication. I aim to apply new technologies in practice and build systems that are not only functional but also maintainable.

contactSection.title: Contact Me
contactSection.description: If you'd like to get in touch, feel free to send me an email or reach out via my social media accounts.
